metadata.title: SuperInbox - Intelligent Inbox Admin
metadata.description: Unified management for your digital inbox

permissionDenied.title: Access denied
permissionDenied.description: Admin permission is required to view this page

sorting.hint: Drag to reorder categories on desktop, use move up/down on mobile; unknown stays fixed at the bottom.
sorting.disabled: At least two active categories are required to sort

errors.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

errors.usernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.usernameMax: Username must be at most 20 characters

badge.analyzing: Background processing, feel free to close

commandSearch.title: Search
commandSearch.description: Search your memories by keywords, category, status, and more
commandSearch.placeholder: Search content, category, status, or content type...

tip.text: üí° Type content directly, or press Tab to select a filter

commandSearch.hint: Press Cmd/Ctrl + K to open search

quickAdd.title: Quick add
quickAdd.description: Capture ideas, to-dos, and files. AI will analyze and categorize automatically.

upload.instructions: Click, drag, or paste files here
upload.supported: Supports images, PDF, audio, video, etc. (up to 100MB per file, 20 files max)

apiKeys.title: API Keys

loadFailure.title: Load failed
loadFailure.description: Unable to load API key list

apiKeys.confirmDelete: Delete API key {name}? This action cannot be undone.

description.edit: Update the API key name and permissions
description.create: Create a new API key for programmatic access

name.label: Name (optional)
name.helper: Give this key a recognizable name

showDialog.title: API key created
showDialog.description: Store this API key in a safe, accessible place. For security reasons, you will not be able to view it again from the API keys page. If you lose it, you will need to create a new one.

mobileMenu.title: Mobile Settings
mobileMenu.description: Manage account access, preferences, and language in one page

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Select the theme for the application

llmConfig.title: LLM Configuration
llmConfig.description: Support multiple active configs with ordered fallback
llmConfig.empty: No config yet. Add at least one configuration first.
llmConfig.fallbackHint: Fallback order is top to bottom. If an upper config fails, the next one is used automatically.

timeout.label: Timeout (ms)
timeout.helper: Leave blank to use the default value

maxTokens.label: Max Tokens
maxTokens.helper: Leave blank to use the default value

apiKey.label: LLM API Key
apiKey.updatePlaceholder: Leave blank to keep current key
apiKey.helper: Leave blank to keep current; clear to fall back to default

createDialog.title: Add LLM Config
createDialog.description: New config joins fallback chain and stays collapsed by default.

activate.label: Activation
activate.helper: Active configs participate in ordered fallback.

editDialog.title: Edit LLM Config
editDialog.description: Update config details while keeping the list compact.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Set your timezone for local time display

current.notSet: Not set. UTC will be used.

timezoneEmpty.title: Timezone required
timezoneEmpty.description: Enter a valid IANA timezone, e.g. Asia/Shanghai

llmProviderEmpty.title: Provider is required
llmProviderEmpty.description: Enter a provider name, e.g. openai

llmModelEmpty.title: Model is required
llmModelEmpty.description: Enter a model name, e.g. openai/gpt-oss-120b

llmApiKeyEmpty.title: LLM API key is required
llmApiKeyEmpty.description: API key is required when creating a config

llmTimeoutInvalid.title: Invalid timeout
llmTimeoutInvalid.description: Enter a positive integer in milliseconds

llmConfigSaved.title: LLM configuration saved
llmConfigSaved.description: New settings will apply to future AI calls

llmApiKeyCleared.title: LLM API key cleared
llmApiKeyCleared.description: Falling back to the default key

export.title: Export access logs

hint.title: Time range:
hint.description: Exports the current filter's time range (about {count} records)

export.asyncWarning: Large dataset (over 1000 records) will be exported asynchronously. You'll be notified when it's ready.

byProvider.description: Requests and token consumption by LLM provider

keys.title: API Key statistics

filters.empty: No connectors match the current filters

create.description: Configure a new Model Context Protocol connector

quickCreate.description: Pick a template first, then provide credentials. Use advanced JSON only when needed.
quickCreate.tokenPlaceholder: Enter token (or skip and authorize later)
quickCreate.tokenHint: This value will be mapped to env key {envKey}
quickCreate.oauthHint: You can leave this empty and click Authorize after creation, or paste a token now.
quickCreate.advancedDescription: Edit JSON only if you need custom command or environment settings.

errors.tokenRequired: This template requires a token before creation.

transportType.label: Transport type
transportType.stdioHint: Communicate via local process (best for Notion)
transportType.httpHint: Communicate via HTTP (best for custom servers)

serverUrl.label: Server URL
serverUrl.helper: HTTP endpoint of the MCP server

command.label: Command
command.helper: Command is generated and run by the backend

apiKey.label: API Key{env, select, true { (env)} other {}}
apiKey.placeholderEdit: Enter new API key (leave blank to keep)

defaultToolName.label: Default tool name (optional)
defaultToolName.helper: Leave empty to use the inferred default tool name

serverUrl.title: Enter server URL
serverUrl.description: HTTP transport requires a server URL

apiKey.title: Enter API key
apiKey.description: API key is required (passed as env var to MCP server)

tools.title: Available tools ({count})
tools.unavailable: Connector is unhealthy, cannot fetch tools list
tools.notTested: Please test the connection first to view tools

jsonConfig.label: MCP Configuration JSON
jsonConfig.description: Paste Claude Desktop MCP configuration JSON to quickly add a connector

help.title: Configuration Guide
help.tip1: Paste Claude Desktop MCP configuration directly
help.tip2: Supports mcpServers or direct serverName format
help.tip3: command and args are automatically merged into full command
help.tip4: API Token in env is automatically extracted

auth.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action

inbox.tooManyFiles: Too many files. Maximum allowed is {max}

inbox.invalidStatus: Item status does not allow this action

ai.systemCategoryImmutable: System fallback category cannot be renamed, disabled, or deleted

logs.invalidFields: Select at least one field to export

aiPage.title: Category Management
aiPage.description: Manage classification rules and examples for the AI classification engine. Enabled categories participate in intelligent content classification.

categoryList.title: Category list
categoryList.description: Enabled categories participate in AI classification and routing rules

library.title: Category Library
library.description: Import by selecting multiple scenarios and categories. Imported categories are disabled by default.
library.emptyScenarioHint: Select one or more scenarios first, then choose categories to import.
library.confirmImport: Import {count} selected categories? They will be added as disabled, and duplicates will be auto-numbered.

personalCapture.name: Personal Capture
personalCapture.description: Covers daily capture like todo, ideas, schedule, notes, and bookmarks.

mediaReading.name: Media & Reading
mediaReading.description: Great for movies, books, and review notes.

workProject.name: Work Projects
workProject.description: For meeting notes, plans, decisions, and follow-up tasks.

contentCreation.name: Content Creation
contentCreation.description: Manage topics, drafts, publishing plans, and reference materials.

financeManagement.name: Finance Management
financeManagement.description: Track reimbursements, bills, budgets, and income.

healthLife.name: Health & Life
healthLife.description: Track fitness, meals, medical follow-up, and lifestyle goals.

travelTrip.name: Travel & Trips
travelTrip.description: Plan itineraries, bookings, and packing lists.

softwareDevelopment.name: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.description: Covers feature requests, bugs, releases, and technical notes.

promptEditor.title: Classification Prompt
promptEditor.description: You can edit the classification prompt manually or generate one with AI. Click "Save & Apply" to take effect immediately for subsequent auto-classification.
promptEditor.rollbackHint: If results are not ideal, you can restore the previous prompt version.
promptEditor.rollbackUnavailable: No previous prompt version available to restore
promptEditor.confirmRollback: Restore the previous prompt version? Unsaved edits will be lost.
promptEditor.advancedDescription: Customize the classification prompt with AI generation, save-and-apply, and restore to the previous version.

generateDialog.title: Generate Prompt
generateDialog.description: Choose a generation strategy and describe your needs. The result will be filled into the current prompt editor.

hints.lowCost: More concise and token-efficient for quick iteration.
hints.highPrecision: More complete rules and stricter constraints for better accuracy.
hints.custom: The prompt will be tailored strictly to your requirements.

requirementPlaceholders.lowCost: Optional: Add rules, boundaries, or misclassified examples (with expected category)
requirementPlaceholders.highPrecision: Optional: Add rules, boundaries, or misclassified examples (with expected category)
requirementPlaceholders.custom: Required: Specify language, dimensions, priorities, and entity rules

generateDialog.requirementRequired: Please enter requirements for custom mode.

categoryDialog.description: Categories power AI intent recognition and routing conditions; disabling won't remove historical data.

key.label: Category key
key.hint: Use lowercase English for rule conditions and API fields.

appearance.label: Category icon and color
appearance.noDefault: No default icon and color are configured for this category.

icon.label: Category icon
icon.hint: The icon appears in category management and inbox badges.

color.label: Category color
color.hint: Leave empty to auto-assign color by category key and sync it to inbox badges.
color.invalid: Please enter a valid #RRGGBB color value.
color.systemFallbackHint: System fallback category is fixed to gray and cannot change color.

active.label: Enable this category
active.systemFallbackHint: System fallback category must remain enabled

categoryKeyUpdated.title: Category key updated
categoryKeyUpdated.description: Subsequent classification and routing will use the new key.

aiPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete category "{name}"?

routingPage.title: Routing Rules
routingPage.description: Configure automatic content distribution rules to route categorized content to different target platforms (e.g., Notion, Obsidian, etc.).

ruleList.title: Rule management
ruleList.systemRuleLocked: System rules cannot be edited or deleted

testConnectorRequired.title: Select a connector first
testConnectorRequired.description: Select an MCP connector to run the test

pageIdRequired.title: Page ID required
pageIdRequired.description: Provide a Notion page ID to append content

testContentRequired.title: Test content required
testContentRequired.description: Content to append to the Notion page

descriptionRequired.title: Rule description required
descriptionRequired.description: Rule description is used as LLM instructions

connectorNotFound.title: Connector not found
connectorNotFound.description: Unable to find MCP connector for "{name}"

dispatchSuccess.title: Append succeeded
dispatchSuccess.description: Content appended to the Notion page

preview.title: Rule preview
preview.description: Test rule matching with sample content
preview.placeholder: Enter sample content or structured text

testDispatch.title: Run test
testDispatch.description: Append content to a Notion page
testDispatch.contentPlaceholder: Content to append to the Notion page...

editDialog.title: Edit rule
editDialog.description: Adjust rule configuration and preview matches

connector.label: Connector (required)
connector.empty: Create a connector on the right first

connector.label: Connector (required)
connector.empty: Create a connector on the right first

none.label: New items only
none.description: Apply this rule only to new items going forward. Historical items will not be affected.

apply.label: Apply to all
apply.description: Immediately apply this rule to all matching historical items.

batch.label: Batch processing
batch.description: Process historical items in batches with custom filters and settings.

applyWarning.title: Apply to historical items?
applyWarning.message: This will immediately apply the routing rule to all matching historical items.
applyWarning.note1: All matching items will be distributed to the configured connector
applyWarning.note3: Consider using 'Batch processing' for more control

batchConfig.title: Batch processing configuration
batchConfig.description: Configure how historical items should be processed in batches.
batchConfig.batchSizeHint: Number of items to process in each batch (1-100)
batchConfig.delayHint: Wait time between batches in milliseconds (100-10000)
batchConfig.summaryText: Process {size} items per batch with {delay}ms delay
